MiniPoop.name: Alien Feces (Small)
MiniPoop.desc: A small quantity of fecal matter from alien fauna.

SeabaseSonar.name: Seabase Sonar Antenna
SeabaseSonar.desc: Continuously fires sonar pulses from a seabase.

SeabaseRepellent.name: Creature Repellant Pylon
SeabaseRepellent.desc: Discourages close approach of creatures to the seabase.

SeabaseBeacon.name: Seabase Beacon
SeabaseBeacon.desc: A beacon affixed to the seabase that broadcasts location and status information.

SeabaseAmpeelAntenna.name: Ampeel Antenna
SeabaseAmpeelAntenna.desc: Draws small amounts of power from passing ampeels to maintain power in a seabase. Most effective at short range. Not capable of sustaining high power loads.

SeabaseFarmer.name: Autofarming Unit
SeabaseFarmer.desc: Automatically harvests from mature plants in nearby growbeds. Will not completely kill the plant.

SeabaseACUCleaner.name: ACU Cleaning System
SeabaseACUCleaner.desc: Keeps the ACU clean of debris, including excreted waste from the contained animals.

SeabaseRemoteCamera.name: Scanner Camera Relay Antenna
SeabaseRemoteCamera.desc: Eliminates the distance attenuation from scanner room camera signals for the attached seabase.

SpineEelDesc.desc: An aggressive and poison-resistant eel-like predator found exclusively in the Lost River.

GhostRayDesc.desc: A large passive herbivore with unusual biology adapted to its native environment.

CrimsonRayDesc.desc: A highly heat-resistant ray species closely related to ghost rays.

BiterDesc.desc: A small fast predator, most dangerous in swarms.

BlighterDesc.desc: A deep-sea and nearly-blind variant of the biter. Prefers carrion to live prey.
